pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:1.5: Asambhinnena vilepanena is an unusual expression. Sp-ṭ 2.357: Asambhinnenāti amakkhitena, anaṭṭhenāti attho, “Asambhinnena: the meaning is ‘with (make-up) not smeared, not lost’.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.8: For an explanation of the renderings “bath powder” and “soap” for cuṇṇa and mattika respectively, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc57:7.1.21: For a discussion of the yojana, see sugata in Appendix I: Technical Terms.
